BlackBerry adds disappearing messages to BBM, continues to have identity crisis

BlackBerry adds disappearing messages to BBM, continues to have identity crisis — I’m hesitant to take this as a sign that BlackBerry’s messaging app is growing; rather, that BBM remains one of the most mismanaged products I’ve ever seen.

Published 30 October 2014
